section.section: The Commission shall meet as often as its duties require, but not less than quarterly.
The chair or co-chairs shall designate a time and place for meetings of the Commission.

text.section: A majority of the voting members of the Commission is a quorum.

A voting member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Commission; but
is entitled to reimbursement in accordance with the Standard State Travel Regulations as provided in the State budget.
The Department shall provide staff support to the Commission.
